mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT d.*, i.*, c.*, u.user_nickname AS writer FROM board d INNER JOIN boardImage i ON d.board_no = i.board_board_no INNER JOIN category c ON d.board_category_no = c.category_no INNER JOIN duck_user u ON d.board_user_no = u.user_no WHERE d.board_category_no = #{categoryNo} ORDER BY d.board_no DESC ) tbl ) WHERE rn > (#{paging.pageNum}-1) * #{paging.cpp} AND rn <= #{paging.pageNum} * #{paging.cpp}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_no, board_title, board_content , board_user_no, board_category_no) VALUES(board_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardUserNo}, #{boardCategoryNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn,tbl.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT c.category_no, b.board_no, b.board_title, b.board_views, c.category_major_title, c.category_minor_title, d.user_nickname, d.user_no FROM duck_user d INNER JOIN favorite f ON f.favorite_user_no= d.user_no INNER JOIN category c ON f.favorite_category_no = c.category_no INNER JOIN board b ON c.category_no = b.board_category_no WHERE d.user_no=1)tbl) WHERE rn > 0 AND rn <= 9 ORDER BY board_views DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT b.board_no, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_views, c.category_major_title, c.category_minor_title, d.user_nickname FROM board b INNER JOIN category c ON b.board_category_no = c.category_no INNER JOIN duck_user d ON b.board_user_no = d.user_no ) tbl ) s WHERE rn > 0 AND rn <= 9 ORDER BY s.category_minor_title DESC, s.board_views DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY notice_no DESC ) tbl ) s WHERE rn > 0 AND rn <= 5
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_views = board_views + 1 WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
